title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (https://contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available https://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/

title: CONTRIBUTING
text: Submit issue Issues page

title: CONTRIBUTING
text: Fork repo Github account Clone version account machine account, e.g,. git clone https://github.com/<yourgithubusername>/wikitaxa.git Make sure track progress upstream (.e., version wikitaxa ropensci/wikitaxa) git remote add upstream https://github.com/ropensci/wikitaxa.git. making changes make sure pull changes upstream either git fetch upstream merge later git pull upstream fetch merge one step Make changes (bonus points making changes new feature branch) Push account Submit pull request home base ropensci/wikitaxa

title: Introduction to the wikitaxa package
text: low level API meant power users gives control, requires knowledge. wt_wiki_page() wt_wiki_page_parse() wt_wiki_url_build() wt_wiki_url_parse() wt_wikispecies_parse() wt_wikicommons_parse() wt_wikipedia_parse()

title: Introduction to the wikitaxa package
text: high level API meant easier faster use. wt_data() wt_data_id() wt_wikispecies() wt_wikicommons() wt_wikipedia() Search functions: wt_wikicommons_search() wt_wikispecies_search() wt_wikipedia_search()

title: Introduction to the wikitaxa package
text: CRAN version Dev version
code: install.packages("wikitaxa") remotes::install_github("ropensci/wikitaxa") library("wikitaxa")

title: Introduction to the wikitaxa package
text: Get Wikidata ID
code: z <- wt_data("Poa annua") names(z) #> [1] "labels"       "descriptions" "aliases"      "sitelinks"    "claims" head(z$labels) #>   language            value #> 1       pt        Poa annua #> 2       is   Varpasveifgras #> 3       pl Wiechlina roczna #> 4       fr   Pâturin annuel #> 5       es        Poa annua #> 6       en        Poa annua wt_data_id("Mimulus foliatus") #> [1] "Q6495130" #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "wiki_id"

title: Introduction to the wikitaxa package
text: lower level higher level choose wikipedia language search search supports languages
code: pg <- wt_wiki_page("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica") res <- wt_wiki_page_parse(pg) res$iwlinks #> [1] "https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Apples"          #> [2] "https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Apple_cultivars" #> [3] "https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q158657"                       #> [4] "https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q18674606"                     #> [5] "https://species.wikimedia.org/wiki/Malus_pumila"             #> [6] "https://species.wikimedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica" res <- wt_wikipedia("Malus domestica") res$common_names #> # A tibble: 1 x 2 #>   name  language #>   <chr> <chr>    #> 1 Apple en res$classification #> # A tibble: 3 x 2 #>   rank       name              #>   <chr>      <chr>             #> 1 plainlinks "" title: Introduction to the wikitaxa package
text: lower level higher level search
code: pg <- wt_wiki_page("https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Abelmoschus") res <- wt_wikicommons_parse(pg) res$common_names[1:3] #> [[1]] #> [[1]]$name #> [1] "okra" #>  #> [[1]]$language #> [1] "en" #>  #>  #> [[2]] #> [[2]]$name #> [1] "مسكي" #>  #> [[2]]$language #> [1] "ar" #>  #>  #> [[3]] #> [[3]]$name #> [1] "Abelmoş" #>  #> [[3]]$language #> [1] "az" res <- wt_wikicommons("Abelmoschus") res$classification #> # A tibble: 15 x 2 #>    rank       name             #>    <chr>      <chr>            #>  1 Domain     "Eukaryota"      #>  2 unranked   "Archaeplastida" #>  3 Regnum     "Plantae"        #>  4 Cladus     "angiosperms"    #>  5 Cladus     "eudicots"       #>  6 Cladus     "core eudicots"  #>  7 Cladus     "superrosids"    #>  8 Cladus     "rosids"         #>  9 Cladus     "eurosids II"    #> 10 Ordo       "Malvales"       #> 11 Familia    "Malvaceae"      #> 12 Subfamilia "Malvoideae"     #> 13 Tribus     "Hibisceae"      #> 14 Genus      "Abelmoschus"    #> 15 Authority  " Medik. (1787)" res$common_names #> # A tibble: 19 x 2 #>    name             language #>    <chr>            <chr>    #>  1 okra             en       #>  2 مسكي             ar       #>  3 Abelmoş          az       #>  4 Bamja            bs       #>  5 Ibiškovec        cs       #>  6 Bisameibisch     de       #>  7 Okrat            fi       #>  8 Abelmosco        gl       #>  9 Abelmošus        hr       #> 10 Ybiškė           lt       #> 11 അബെൽമോസ്കസ്        ml       #> 12 Абельмош         mrj      #> 13 Abelmoskusslekta nn       #> 14 Piżmian          pl       #> 15 Абельмош         ru       #> 16 Okrasläktet      sv       #> 17 Абельмош         udm      #> 18 Chi Vông vang    vi       #> 19 黄葵属           zh wt_wikicommons_search(query = "Pinus") #> $batchcomplete #> [1] "" #>  #> $continue #> $continue$sroffset #> [1] 10 #>  #> $continue$continue #> [1] "-||" #>  #>  #> $query #> $query$searchinfo #> $query$searchinfo$totalhits #> [1] 270 #>  #>  #> $query$search #> # title: Introduction to the wikitaxa package
text: lower level higher level search
code: pg <- wt_wiki_page("https://species.wikimedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica") res <- wt_wikispecies_parse(pg, types = "common_names") res$common_names[1:3] #> [[1]] #> [[1]]$name #> [1] "Ябълка" #>  #> [[1]]$language #> [1] "български" #>  #>  #> [[2]] #> [[2]]$name #> [1] "Poma, pomera" #>  #> [[2]]$language #> [1] "català" #>  #>  #> [[3]] #> [[3]]$name #> [1] "jabloň domácí" #>  #> [[3]]$language #> [1] "čeština" res <- wt_wikispecies("Malus domestica") res$classification #> # A tibble: 8 x 2 #>   rank        name          #>   <chr>       <chr>         #> 1 Superregnum Eukaryota     #> 2 Regnum      Plantae       #> 3 Cladus      Angiosperms   #> 4 Cladus      Eudicots      #> 5 Cladus      Core eudicots #> 6 Cladus      Rosids        #> 7 Cladus      Eurosids I    #> 8 Ordo        Rosales res$common_names #> # A tibble: 22 x 2 #>    name          language   #>    <chr>         <chr>      #>  1 Ябълка        български  #>  2 Poma, pomera  català     #>  3 jabloň domácí čeština    #>  4 Apfel         Deutsch    #>  5 Μηλιά         Ελληνικά   #>  6 Apple         English    #>  7 Manzano       español    #>  8 Aed-õunapuu   eesti      #>  9 Tarhaomenapuu suomi      #> 10 Aapel         Nordfriisk #> # … with 12 more rows wt_wikispecies_search(query = "Pinus") #> $batchcomplete #> [1] "" #>  #> $continue #> $continue$sroffset #> [1] 10 #>  #> $continue$continue #> [1] "-||" #>  #>  #> $query #> $query$searchinfo #> $query$searchinfo$totalhits #> [1] 515 #>  #>  #> $query$search #> # title: Authors and Citation
text: Scott Chamberlain. Author. Ethan Welty. Author. Grzegorz Sapijaszko. Author. Zachary Foster. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Chamberlain S, Welty E, Sapijaszko G, Foster Z (2024). wikitaxa: Taxonomic Information 'Wikipedia'. R package version 0.4.0.91, https://github.com/ropensci/wikitaxa, https://docs.ropensci.org/wikitaxa.
code: @Manual{,   title = {wikitaxa: Taxonomic Information from 'Wikipedia'},   author = {Scott Chamberlain and Ethan Welty and Grzegorz Sapijaszko and Zachary Foster},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.4.0.91, https://github.com/ropensci/wikitaxa},   url = {https://docs.ropensci.org/wikitaxa}, }

title: Taxonomic Information from Wikipedia
text: wikitaxa - taxonomy data Wikipedia/Wikidata/Wikispecies wikitaxa docs: https://docs.ropensci.org/wikitaxa/ See also taxize book: https://books.ropensci.org/taxize/

title: Taxonomic Information from Wikipedia
text: low level API meant power users gives control, requires knowledge. wt_wiki_page() wt_wiki_page_parse() wt_wiki_url_build() wt_wiki_url_parse() wt_wikispecies_parse() wt_wikicommons_parse() wt_wikipedia_parse()

title: Taxonomic Information from Wikipedia
text: high level API meant easier faster use. wt_data() wt_data_id() wt_wikispecies() wt_wikicommons() wt_wikipedia() Search functions: wt_wikicommons_search() wt_wikispecies_search() wt_wikipedia_search()

title: Taxonomic Information from Wikipedia
text: CRAN version Dev version
code: install.packages("wikitaxa") remotes::install_github("ropensci/wikitaxa") library('wikitaxa')

title: Taxonomic Information from Wikipedia
text: Ethan Welty Scott Chamberlain

title: Taxonomic Information from Wikipedia
text: Please report issues bugs. License: MIT Get citation information wikitaxa R citation(package = 'wikitaxa') Please note project released Contributor Code Conduct. participating project agree abide terms.

title: List of Wikipedias — wikipedias
text: data.frame 295 rows, 3 columns: language - language language_local - language local name wiki - langugae code wiki

title: List of Wikipedias — wikipedias
text: https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/List_of_Wikipedias

title: wikitaxa — wikitaxa-package
text: Taxonomic Information Wikipedia

title: wikitaxa — wikitaxa-package
text: Scott Chamberlain myrmecocystus@gmail.com Ethan Welty

title: Wikidata taxonomy data — wt_data
text: Wikidata taxonomy data

title: Wikidata taxonomy data — wt_data
code: wt_data(x, property = NULL, ...)  wt_data_id(x, language = "en", limit = 10, ...)

title: Wikidata taxonomy data — wt_data
text: x (character) taxonomic name property (character) property id, e.g., P486 ... curl options passed httr::GET() language (character) two letter language code limit (integer) records return. Default: 10

title: Wikidata taxonomy data — wt_data
text: wt_data searches Wikidata, returns list elements: labels - data.frame columns: language, value descriptions - data.frame columns: language, value aliases - data.frame columns: language, value sitelinks - data.frame columns: site, title claims - data.frame columns: claims, property_value, property_description, value (comma separted values string) wt_data_id gets Wikidata ID searched term, returns ID character

title: Wikidata taxonomy data — wt_data
text: Note wt_data can take run since fetching claims one time claim can search things taxonomic names wt_data like

title: Wikidata taxonomy data — wt_data
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # search by taxon name # wt_data("Mimulus alsinoides")  # choose which properties to return wt_data(x="Mimulus foliatus", property = c("P846", "P815"))  # get a taxonomic identifier wt_data_id("Mimulus foliatus") # the id can be passed directly to wt_data() # wt_data(wt_data_id("Mimulus foliatus")) } # }

what: Get MediaWiki Page from API — wt_wiki_page
title: Get MediaWiki Page from API — wt_wiki_page
text: Supports static page urls equivalent API calls.

title: Get MediaWiki Page from API — wt_wiki_page
code: wt_wiki_page(url, ...)

title: Get MediaWiki Page from API — wt_wiki_page
text: url (character) MediaWiki page url. ... Arguments passed wt_wiki_url_build() url static page url.

title: Get MediaWiki Page from API — wt_wiki_page
text: HttpResponse response object crul

title: Get MediaWiki Page from API — wt_wiki_page
text: URL given human readable html page, convert equivalent API call - URL already API call, just use .

title: Get MediaWiki Page from API — wt_wiki_page
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ wt_wiki_page("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica") } # }

title: Parse MediaWiki Page — wt_wiki_page_parse
text: Parses common properties result MediaWiki API page call.

title: Parse MediaWiki Page — wt_wiki_page_parse
code: wt_wiki_page_parse(   page,   types = c("langlinks", "iwlinks", "externallinks"),   tidy = FALSE )

title: Parse MediaWiki Page — wt_wiki_page_parse
text: page (crul::HttpResponse) Result wt_wiki_page() types (character) List properties parse. tidy (logical). tidy output data.frames possible. Default: FALSE

title: Parse MediaWiki Page — wt_wiki_page_parse
text: list

title: Parse MediaWiki Page — wt_wiki_page_parse
text: Available properties currently parsed: title, displaytitle, pageid, revid, redirects, text, categories, links, templates, images, sections, properties, ...

title: Parse MediaWiki Page — wt_wiki_page_parse
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ pg <- wt_wiki_page("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica") wt_wiki_page_parse(pg) } # }

title: Build MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_build
text: Builds MediaWiki page url component parts (wiki name, wiki type, page title). Supports static page urls equivalent API calls.

title: Build MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_build
code: wt_wiki_url_build(   wiki,   type = NULL,   page = NULL,   api = FALSE,   action = "parse",   redirects = TRUE,   format = "json",   utf8 = TRUE,   prop = c("text", "langlinks", "categories", "links", "templates", "images",     "externallinks", "sections", "revid", "displaytitle", "iwlinks", "properties") )

title: Build MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_build
text: wiki (character | list) Either wiki name list $wiki, $type, $page (output wt_wiki_url_parse()). type (character) Wiki type. page (character) Wiki page title. api (boolean) Whether return API call static page url (default). FALSE, following (API-) arguments ignored. action (character) See https://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php supported actions. function currently supports "parse". redirects (boolean) requested page set redirect, resolve . format (character) See https://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php supported output formats. utf8 (boolean) TRUE, encodes () non-ASCII characters UTF-8 instead replacing hexadecimal escape sequences. prop (character) Properties retrieve, either character vector pipe-delimited string. See https://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php?action=help&modules=parse supported properties.

title: Build MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_build
text: URL (character)

title: Build MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_build
code: wt_wiki_url_build(wiki = "en", type = "wikipedia", page = "Malus domestica") #> [1] "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica" wt_wiki_url_build(   wt_wiki_url_parse("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica")) #> [1] "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica" wt_wiki_url_build("en", "wikipedia", "Malus domestica", api = TRUE) #> [1] "https://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php?page=Malus_domestica&action=parse&redirects=TRUE&format=json&utf8=TRUE&prop=text%7Clanglinks%7Ccategories%7Clinks%7Ctemplates%7Cimages%7Cexternallinks%7Csections%7Crevid%7Cdisplaytitle%7Ciwlinks%7Cproperties"

title: Parse MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_parse
text: Parse MediaWiki page url component parts (wiki name, wiki type, page title). Supports static page urls equivalent API calls.

title: Parse MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_parse
code: wt_wiki_url_parse(url)

title: Parse MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_parse
text: url (character) MediaWiki page url.

title: Parse MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_parse
text: list elements: wiki - wiki language type - wikipedia type page - page name

title: Parse MediaWiki Page URL — wt_wiki_url_parse
code: wt_wiki_url_parse(url="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica") #> $wiki #> [1] "en" #>  #> $type #> [1] "wikipedia" #>  #> $page #> [1] "Malus_domestica" #>  wt_wiki_url_parse("https://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php?page=Malus_domestica") #> $wiki #> [1] "en" #>  #> $type #> [1] "wikipedia" #>  #> $page #> [1] "Malus_domestica" #>

title: WikiCommons — wt_wikicommons
text: WikiCommons

title: WikiCommons — wt_wikicommons
code: wt_wikicommons(name, utf8 = TRUE, ...)  wt_wikicommons_parse(   page,   types = c("langlinks", "iwlinks", "externallinks", "common_names", "classification"),   tidy = FALSE )  wt_wikicommons_search(query, limit = 10, offset = 0, utf8 = TRUE, ...)

title: WikiCommons — wt_wikicommons
text: name (character) Wiki name - page title, must length 1 utf8 (logical) TRUE, encodes () non-ASCII characters UTF-8 instead replacing hexadecimal escape sequences. Default: TRUE ... curl options, passed httr::GET() page (httr::response()) Result wt_wiki_page() types (character) List properties parse tidy (logical). tidy output data.frame's possible. Default: FALSE query (character) query terms limit (integer) number results return. Default: 10 offset (integer) record start . Default: 0

title: WikiCommons — wt_wikicommons
text: wt_wikicommons returns list, slots: langlinks - language page links externallinks - external links common_names - data.frame name language columns classification - data.frame rank name columns wt_wikicommons_parse returns list wt_wikicommons_search returns list slots continue query, query holds results, query$search slot search results

title: WikiCommons — wt_wikicommons
text: https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API:Search help search

title: WikiCommons — wt_wikicommons
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # high level wt_wikicommons(name = "Malus domestica") wt_wikicommons(name = "Pinus contorta") wt_wikicommons(name = "Ursus americanus") wt_wikicommons(name = "Balaenoptera musculus")  wt_wikicommons(name = "Category:Poeae") wt_wikicommons(name = "Category:Pinaceae")  # low level pg <- wt_wiki_page("https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica") wt_wikicommons_parse(pg)  # search wikicommons # FIXME: utf=FALSE for now until curl::curl_escape fix  # https://github.com/jeroen/curl/issues/228 wt_wikicommons_search(query = "Pinus", utf8 = FALSE)  ## use search results to dig into pages res <- wt_wikicommons_search(query = "Pinus", utf8 = FALSE) lapply(res$query$search$title[1:3], wt_wikicommons) } # }

title: Wikipedia — wt_wikipedia
text: Wikipedia

title: Wikipedia — wt_wikipedia
code: wt_wikipedia(name, wiki = "en", utf8 = TRUE, ...)  wt_wikipedia_parse(   page,   types = c("langlinks", "iwlinks", "externallinks", "common_names", "classification"),   tidy = FALSE )  wt_wikipedia_search(   query,   wiki = "en",   limit = 10,   offset = 0,   utf8 = TRUE,   ... )

title: Wikipedia — wt_wikipedia
text: name (character) Wiki name - page title, must length 1 wiki (character) wiki language. default: en. See wikipedias language codes. utf8 (logical) TRUE, encodes () non-ASCII characters UTF-8 instead replacing hexadecimal escape sequences. Default: TRUE ... curl options, passed httr::GET() page (httr::response()) Result wt_wiki_page() types (character) List properties parse tidy (logical). tidy output data.frame's possible. Default: FALSE query (character) query terms limit (integer) number results return. Default: 10 offset (integer) record start . Default: 0

title: Wikipedia — wt_wikipedia
text: wt_wikipedia returns list, slots: langlinks - language page links externallinks - external links common_names - data.frame name language columns classification - data.frame rank name columns synonyms - character vector taxonomic names wt_wikipedia_parse returns list slots determined types parmeter wt_wikipedia_search returns list slots continue query, query holds results, query$search slot search results

title: Wikipedia — wt_wikipedia
text: https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API:Search help search

title: Wikipedia — wt_wikipedia
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # high level wt_wikipedia(name = "Malus domestica") wt_wikipedia(name = "Malus domestica", wiki = "fr") wt_wikipedia(name = "Malus domestica", wiki = "da")  # low level pg <- wt_wiki_page("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malus_domestica") wt_wikipedia_parse(pg) wt_wikipedia_parse(pg, tidy = TRUE)  # search wikipedia # FIXME: utf=FALSE for now until curl::curl_escape fix  # https://github.com/jeroen/curl/issues/228 wt_wikipedia_search(query = "Pinus", utf8=FALSE) wt_wikipedia_search(query = "Pinus", wiki = "fr", utf8=FALSE) wt_wikipedia_search(query = "Pinus", wiki = "br", utf8=FALSE)  ## curl options # wt_wikipedia_search(query = "Pinus", verbose = TRUE, utf8=FALSE)  ## use search results to dig into pages res <- wt_wikipedia_search(query = "Pinus", utf8=FALSE) lapply(res$query$search$title[1:3], wt_wikipedia) } # }

title: WikiSpecies — wt_wikispecies
text: WikiSpecies

title: WikiSpecies — wt_wikispecies
code: wt_wikispecies(name, utf8 = TRUE, ...)  wt_wikispecies_parse(   page,   types = c("langlinks", "iwlinks", "externallinks", "common_names", "classification"),   tidy = FALSE )  wt_wikispecies_search(query, limit = 10, offset = 0, utf8 = TRUE, ...)

title: WikiSpecies — wt_wikispecies
text: name (character) Wiki name - page title, must length 1 utf8 (logical) TRUE, encodes () non-ASCII characters UTF-8 instead replacing hexadecimal escape sequences. Default: TRUE ... curl options, passed httr::GET() page (httr::response()) Result wt_wiki_page() types (character) List properties parse tidy (logical). tidy output data.frame's possible. Default: FALSE query (character) query terms limit (integer) number results return. Default: 10 offset (integer) record start . Default: 0

title: WikiSpecies — wt_wikispecies
text: wt_wikispecies returns list, slots: langlinks - language page links externallinks - external links common_names - data.frame name language columns classification - data.frame rank name columns wt_wikispecies_parse returns list wt_wikispecies_search returns list slots continue query, query holds results, query$search slot search results

title: WikiSpecies — wt_wikispecies
text: https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API:Search help search

title: WikiSpecies — wt_wikispecies
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # high level wt_wikispecies(name = "Malus domestica") wt_wikispecies(name = "Pinus contorta") wt_wikispecies(name = "Ursus americanus") wt_wikispecies(name = "Balaenoptera musculus")  # low level pg <- wt_wiki_page("https://species.wikimedia.org/wiki/Abelmoschus") wt_wikispecies_parse(pg)  # search wikispecies # FIXME: utf=FALSE for now until curl::curl_escape fix  # https://github.com/jeroen/curl/issues/228 wt_wikispecies_search(query = "pine tree", utf8=FALSE)  ## use search results to dig into pages res <- wt_wikispecies_search(query = "pine tree", utf8=FALSE) lapply(res$query$search$title[1:3], wt_wikispecies) } # }
